question: What is the theme of the 2018 Vigilance Awareness Week (VAW)?
option1: Combating Corruption – Technology as an enabler
option4: Promoting Good Governance: Positive contribution of vigilance
explanation: The Central Vigilance Commission (CVC) observes the Vigilance Awareness Week every year during the week in which the birthday of Sardar Vallabh bhai Patel (31st October) falls. This year, the Vigilance Awareness Week is being observed from 29th October to 3rd November, 2018 on the theme “Eradicate Corruption-Build a New India\". It   seeks to motivate stakeholders to collectively participate in the fight against corruption and also aims at raising public awareness regarding the detrimental consequences of corruption.
